notesStmt.note: Catchword on 48v does not match the first words on 49r
Script and written area changes slightly after quire 7 (fol. 88), which may indicate the manuscript was two separate manuscripts bound together

msIdentifier.collection: John Frederick Lewis Collection of European Manuscripts

msContents.summary: This manuscript is a fourteenth-century Italian copy of Life of Holy Francis and his companions.

msItem.title: Life of Holy Francis and his companions

supportDesc.extent: i+120+i; 206 x 142 mm bound to 216 x 144 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Modern foliation in pencil, upper right recto

collation.p: Four quires of twelve leaves, one quire of sixteen, uncertain after that

layoutDesc.layout: Rubrication in red; prickings visible; three-line initials in red; written area: 130 x 98 mm

decoDesc.decoNote: Inside front coverProvenance label "From the Library of Victor Christ"
Inside front coverFree Library of Philadelphia Bookplate

history.provenance: Victor Christ Library; Purchased by the Free Library through the George S. Pepper Fund
